document_data.caption: A map of Huzuz showing the Grand Bazaar Boulevard lined in black.
document_data.name: Grand Bazaar Boulevard
document_data.mainbody: The '''Grand Bazaar Boulevard''' was located in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: This road ran from the heart of Huzuz near the mosques in the [[Pilgrims' District]] northwest to the [[Grand Bazaar]] in the [[Merchants' District]]. It bordered the entire southern face of the Grand Bazaar, providing ample access to the giant marketplace. The Grand Bazaar Boulevard also passed through the [[Central District]] en route to the bazaar.
